thread.title: Nii Kormiete Doku retains Greater Accra Regional FA Chairmanship
thread.title_full: Nii Kormiete Doku retains Greater Accra Regional FA Chairmanship

title: Nii Kormiete Doku retains Greater Accra Regional FA Chairmanship
text:
17:00 CET Nii Kormiete Doku retains Greater Accra Regional FA Chairmanship By GNA 
Accra, Oct. 11, GNA - Nii Kormeite Doku, was retained as the chairman of the Greater Accra Regional Football Association (GARFA) after their regional elections on Monday. 
Nii Doku polled 72 votes while his contender Eugene Jarquaye, who was tipped to cause an upset had 17 votes out of the total votes cast. 
Nii Doku, will supervise the activities of the region for the next four years and represent them at the Ghana Football Association (GFA) National Executive Committee. 
GNA
